Message:
Since then, I worked hard,
and was even named as
the chief’s successor.

I still loathed
that horrible man,

but now, I had something
more important.
I had the Mountain Tribe,

and had parted ways with
my resentful past self.

At least, that’s what
I thought...
He came back.

The one who murdered
all my comrades was now
raiding our hideout.

He was full of it,
claiming he was here to
subjugate the corrupted witch.

But in reality,
he came to kill me...
because I knew the truth.

Everyone was massacred—
even the chief.

He tried to protect those
who couldn’t escape,
but was gunned down.

Dark thoughts
reemerged inside me.

You’re gonna take
my friends away
from me again...?!

Then, as if encouraging me,
the chief’s words flashed
in my mind.
“Stay strong...
Kill him...
Kill ’em all.”

Obeying those words,
I released my
magic power...
To kill all my enemies.

To prove the strength
of the Tribe.
